text: Faith is a 1919 American silent drama film, directed by Charles Swickard. It stars Bert Lytell, Rosemary Theby, and Edythe Chapman, and was released on February 3, 1919. ==Cast list== * Bert Lytell as George Farrelly * Rosemary Theby as Charity Garvice * Edythe Chapman as Martha Owen * Edwin Stevens as Abner Harrington * Nancy Chase as Mrs. Harrington ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Metro Pictures films Category:Films directed by Charles Swickard Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American drama films Category:1919 drama films Category:1919 films
title: Faith (1919 film)
